metadata.title: CVE-2020-25631 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in Moodle 3.9 to 3.9.1, 3.8 to 3.8.4 and 3.7 to3.7.7 where it was possible to include JavaScript in a book's chaptertitle, which was not escaped on the "Add new chapter" page. This is fixedin 3.9.2, 3.8.5 and 3.7.8.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
